The \"relay\" is a server on the internet that passes messages between devices that are running Crosswords. It works any time you have a fully-functional internet connection, but might have problems on restricted WiFi networks.

Play via SMS uses the same technology as \"texting\". Though the messages are invisible to you, your carrier considers them texts, so you want to avoid this feature unless you have an unlimited texting plan (or budget.) Note that Android only supports this feature on devices on a GSM carrier, i.e. every carrier in the world except Verizon and Sprint.
